extendedInfo.description: Learn Bahasa Indonesian Lite is an easy to use mobile Bahasa Indonesian phrasebook that will give visitors to Indonesia and those who are interested in learning Bahasa Indonesia a good start in the language.â¦ Get the full set of phrasebooks for FREE! Search for "codegent" and download more languages.. Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, French, Italian, many more. â¦ Learn Bahasa Indonesian is recorded using a native speaker and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. Recommended app for tourists and business people visiting Indonesia.Features:* Carefully translated list of essential phrases* High quality audio pronunciation by native speaker* Play all phrases automatically in each category* Ability to adjust font size* No internet connection required* Highlight important words with tips* Store frequently used phrases in favourites* Search by keywords* No adverts or annoying popupsIf you like this app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating. For comments and suggestions please send an email to apps@codegent.com. All your feedback and comments are appreciated.The LITE version contains over 300+ essential phrases in the following categories* Greetings* General conversation* Numbers* Directions and places* Transportation* Eating outUpgrade and unlock all 900+ phrases in these categorieshttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codegent.apps.learn.indonesianpro* Time and date* Accommodation* Shopping* Colours* Towns and provinces* Countries* Tourist attractions* Family* Dating* Emergency* Feeling sick* Tongue twistersFEEDBACKIf you like this app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating in the Android Market. For comments and suggestions please send an email to apps@codegent.com. We love getting feedback from users of our apps.Follow us on twitter : http://www.twitter.com/codegentappsMORE LANGUAGES AVAILABLEGet the whole Learn series.. Japanese, Chinese, Thai, and more. Find all our language apps by searching for "Codegent" or clicking through to view our other apps

reviews.title: Remember But Without Learning
reviews.comment: It is good that every sentence has good audio. But as individual words are not shown with their meaning, this is a bit like learning parrot fashion.

reviews.title: Sorta good
reviews.comment: Ive taken Indo classes for about five years now and I can honestly say that some of the phrases are actually incorrect :( also it would be nicer to have more FREE options/categories, but other than that its good (:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: I\'m half Indonesian so my family speaks Bahasa fluently. Sadly I cannot lol so this app is really useful. It\'s good that the translator doesn\'t speak too fast. Wonderful to have when your in Indonesia and nobody knows English, but there are so many different dialects there. I mostly used it in Jakarta. Overall excellent app. Nice job codegen! I might upgrade to the pro version!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Review from a native Indonesian
reviews.comment: As a native Indonesian, I think this app is excellent. The pronounciation is perfect, maybe a little corrections on the high or low tone at the end of some phrases (honestly, it would make different meanings). There are repetition of phrases between categories, perhaps it would vary if you get the pro version. For future update, I strongly suggest to add some casual conversation, because if you follow exactly like how they pronounce it, Indonesians would definitely tilt their head a bit :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
